Title: silverstripe/framework has Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in CMSSecurity BackURL
Description: In follow up to [SS-2016-001](https://www.silverstripe.org/download/security-releases/ss-2016-001/) there is yet a minor unresolved fix to incorrectly encoded URL.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.1.0-rc1 before 3.1.21, all versions starting from 3.2.0-rc1 before 3.2.6, all versions starting from 3.3.0-rc1 before 3.3.4, all versions starting from 3.4.0-rc1 before 3.4.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.1.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.1.21 before 3.2.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.2.6 before 3.3.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.3.4 before 3.4.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.4.2
